DescriptionData.Title: Mehron GlitterMark Liquid Glitter - Deacon Blue BL (0.5 oz)
DescriptionData.Description:
GlitterMark liquid glitter is Mehron's Liquid Glitter designed by Mark Reid, the world famous face and body painter and instructor. Designed for professionals and passionate face and body painters, GlitterMark is Mehron's fabulous glitter dust mixed with liquid and made into a gel for easy application and control.
Mehron Liquid Glitter comes in an applicator that has a fine tip which is great for creating fine lines and 3 dimensional details. It is highly pigmented and works well for accents, glitter tattoos, body jewels and henna designs.
Mehron GlitterMark liquid glitter is paraben and alcohol free. 0.5 ounce size.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 0.5 ounce bottle of GlitterMark Deacon Blue glitter gel will give dozens of applications, depending on use
Designed by Mark Reid, the world famous face and body painter instructor
Glitter dust mixed with liquid for an easy to control gel
Perfect for fine intricate detailing and fine designs
Safe for use all over the body, it is also paraben and alcohol free
